    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    DatabaseConnection
    Class that handles setting up and accessing connection to psql database.
    EmployeeDAO
    Class that handles any employee-related database queries.
    GraphDAO
    Class that handles queries for graph-related calls.
    Inventory
    Swing UI for inventory management.
    InventoryDAO
    Data-access object (DAO) for inventory-related queries and updates.
    InventoryDAO.InventoryItem
    Helper class to hold information about each inventory item.
    Login
    Login form for the application that handles user authentication.
    ManagerHomeScreen
    Class that handles manager homescreen GUI.
    MenuDAO
    Class that handles menu-related database queries.
    MenuDAO.MenuItem
    MenuItem class represents a menu item with its properties.
    MenuManagement
    Class that handles all menu management UI.
    Orders
    Orders form for managing customer orders in the restaurant system.
    Reports
    Manager-facing UI for creating, previewing, storing, viewing, and deleting end-of-day and ad-hoc reports.
    SalesReport
    Swing UI to generate an item-level sales summary.
    Staff
    Class that handles all staff UI.
    Transactions
    Swing UI for browsing and filtering POS order transactions.
    Trends
    Swing UI that renders sales and usage trends using JFreeChart.
    XReportDAO
    Simple class to handle all X- and Z-Report generation.
    XReportDAO.DailyTotals
    Class to hold information about daily totals and their attributes.
    XReportDAO.HourlySales
    Class to hold attributes of hourly sales data.
    XReportDAO.PaymentMethodData
    Class to hold payment method information and attributes.
    XReportDAO.TopItem
    Class to hold information about top selling items.
